pullrequest.title: Updates to DRCSim Modify World tutorial for 4.1

content.raw: I think I updated this tutorial last and didn't include an important step. Currently loading a world that contains `<state>` tags is not working properly ([gazebo issue 312](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/312/re-enable-physics-states-test)). So the missing step in this tutorial is opening the saved world file and deleting the `<state>` tag and all its child elements. Can you try that?
content.html: I think I updated this tutorial last and didn't include an important step. Currently loading a world that contains <state> tags is not working properly (gazebo issue 312). So the missing step in this tutorial is opening the saved world file and deleting the <state> tag and all its child elements. Can you try that?
